summary: Adds a companion to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Yup, here I am again with yet another creation. Same as before in that she will use your meshes and textures. She can be found standing by her statue and if you don't know where that is I provided a map. She has enhanced combat skills and mainly uses a sword or bow. Since Meridia is kinda focused on beams I gave her a light beam spell. There isn't really much to tell since she is a basic follower. You can marry her and she comes with her own custom armor.  The main version does not include the warpaint so if you want the warpaint then install the patch provided. Oh, and if you do the Break Of Dawn quest Meridia will be in a human form as shown in the video. 


[youtube]05cDp1hY69Y[/youtube]
author: Kittyness
